channel.title: Posts on The ramblings of Trshant's mind!

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I have moved my entire blogging to github pages. I am using Hugo, a delightfully simple static file generator. I plan on using a small cron on the raspberry pi to post stuff to my trshant.github.io site……atleast thats what i think. This is also a test filewhere i will be trying out newer things i want to do. function hello(){ console.log("hello world!"); } i ‚ù§ this.
